en: Can not exit in transition animation

zh:
通过探索并与环境和人物互动你会得到各种物品。

拾取物品后你就可以从道具栏中选择它。

选中的物品可以和道具栏其他物品进行合成，或者在特定地方使用，帮助你推进游戏进程。
en:
By exploring and interacting with the environment, and characters, you will obtain various items.

After picking up an item, you can select it from the inventory.

The selected item can be combined with other items in the inventory, or used in specific locations,to help you progress through the game.

zh: 你知道吗，我把太阳放到这上面之后就睡着了。
en: Did you know that I put the sun on this spot and it fell asleep after that?

zh: 大家应该在下面等我，我觉得我得下去了。
en: Everyone should be waiting below, I think I should go down now.

zh: 下面的世界看起来很小...
en: The world below looks so small...

zh: %s，你知道我把太阳放回去之后发生了什么吗？
en: %s, do you know what happened after I put the sun back?

zh: 或许我拯救了世界，又或许像其他人所说的那样，即使有了太阳也没有多大帮助。
en: Perhaps I saved the world, or perhaps as others say, even with the sun it didn't help much.

zh: 但是，也许我被永远留在了这里。
en: But as you say, perhaps I'm stuck here, forever.
Now is not the time to sleep.

zh: 这似乎是某种坏掉的计算机终端。
en: It seems to be some kind of broken computer terminal.

zh: 现在 Niko 被永远留在了这里。
en: Now Niko is trapped here forever.

zh: ... 你既没有拯救世界，也没有拯救 Niko。
en: ... You neither saved the world nor saved Niko.

zh: 你的“任务”是帮助 Niko 离开。
en: Your "mission" was to help Niko leave.
